00405 
00406 inline uint32  
00407 BoundrySegment::getNbrConnectionsToNode(byte i) const 
00408 {
00409    if (i == 0)
00410       return (m_connectionsToNode0.size());
00411    else 
00412       return (m_connectionsToNode1.size());
00413 }
00414 
00415 inline Connection* 
00416 BoundrySegment::getConnectToNode(byte n, uint32 i) const
00417 {
00418    MC2_ASSERT( (n == 0) || (n == 1));
00419    if (n == 0) {
00420       return (m_connectionsToNode0[i].second);
00421    } else {
00422       return (m_connectionsToNode1[i].second);
00423    }
00424 }
00425 
00426 inline uint32 
00427 BoundrySegment::getFromMapIDToNode(byte n, uint32 i) const
00428 {
00429    MC2_ASSERT( (n == 0) || (n == 1));
00430    if (n == 0) {
00431       return (m_connectionsToNode0[i].first);
00432    } else {
00433       return (m_connectionsToNode1[i].first);
00434    }
00435 }
00436 
00437

00443 }
00444

00446 BoundrySegment::getFromMapIDToNode0(uint32 i) const

00448    return (m_connectionsToNode0[i].first);
00449 }

00481 // - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
00482 //                                                 BoundrySegmentsVector -
00483 
00484 inline BoundrySegment*
00485 BoundrySegmentsVector::getBoundrySegment(uint32 itemID)
00486 {
00487    BoundrySegment searchEC(itemID & ITEMID_MASK, BoundrySegment::noNodeClose);
00488 
00489    BoundrySegmentVector::iterator it = lower_bound( m_boundrySegments.begin(), 
00490                                                     m_boundrySegments.end(),
00491                                                     &searchEC, 
00492                                                     STLUtility::RefLess() );
00493    if ( it != m_boundrySegments.end() && ( *(*it) == searchEC ) ) {
00494       return *it;
00495    } else {
00496       return NULL;
00497    }   
00498 }
00499 
00500 inline uint32
00501 BoundrySegmentsVector::getSize() {
00502    return m_boundrySegments.size();
00503 }
00504 
00505 inline BoundrySegment*
00506 BoundrySegmentsVector::getElementAt(unsigned int pos) {
00507    if ( pos < m_boundrySegments.size() ) {
00508       return m_boundrySegments[ pos ];
00509    } else {
00510       return NULL;
00511    }
00512 }
00513 
00514 inline void
00515 BoundrySegmentsVector::push_back(BoundrySegment* elm) {
00516    return m_boundrySegments.push_back( elm );;
00517 }
00518 
00519 inline uint32 
00520 BoundrySegmentsVector::getMemoryUsage() const 
00521 {
00522    return sizeof(BoundrySegmentsVector) + 
00523       m_boundrySegments.size() * sizeof(BoundrySegment);
00524 }
